name: Gear of Generator (Jules Rouault)
description:
WARNING: you must have a controller to play this game!

OTHER WARNING: this game doesn't have sound yet! Don't be surprised if you hear nothing!

You have 4 generators. Each one allows you two do something ( repair your weapons, upgrade them, ... ), but they are fragile, and your ennemies will try to destroy them. Stay alive, manage your weapons and traps, kill the ennemies, protect your generators and repair them if they are damaged!

This game has been made in two days during the Global Game Jam 2020

Controls:

- Fire: Right Trigger

- Put traps on the ground: Left Trigger

- Switch weapon: Y

- Interact with generators: X

- Repair generators and take weapons: A

- Change trap that you want to buy: Directionnal pad while near generator

- Switch trap: B

Programmation:

- Jules Rouault (https://polipot.itch.io/)

- Hugo Cluzel (https://petite-bryndye.itch.io/)

Level Design/ Level Building:

- Mathys Boissiere

Game Art:

- Haris Kacimi

- Timothée Bignon
